showerReviews.reviewText: Pulled in and took on $500 in fuel and I was hoping to get a shower. Lady behind the counter told me, the showers were closed and hadn't been cleaned in a month.

showerReviews.reviewText: Nice staff. Clean facilities. Has a new restaurant: Naf Naf. Pretty darn good I think. üòã ‚Ä¶
Lots of things to choose from. Clean bathrooms. Pok√©mon products. Even a Sonic the hedgehog squishy. ‚Ä¶
The night shift attendant was exceptionally kind. She made sure that we had fresh towels for our showers after we had a bad experience at a different love's. She made our night. Thank you

Friendly and courteous people.  The bathrooms were clean and tidy,  as well as the store itself.  They actually have an IHOP inside. Downside is that they don't offer any special pancakes.  Just the original. They  also have Chester Chicken ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ gas. Bathroom were clean to my surprise and employees friendly. Back up heading north next night stop over 6am shower, walk to shower we walked on wet dirty towels to get to our showers! They were just thrown out in the hallway! Wasn't the ‚Ä¶
Showers were disgusting balls of hair still on the floor hair on the shower wall stuff still on the sink truly unacceptable the employee cleaning them should be fired it's 2149 on 08/24/25

The works are rude all but the guy that is cleaning the shower he was nice and understood that the shower was so gross when I walk in there I had to clean is up my self before taking a shower and I say the works are rude because I let one ‚Ä¶

Came here for a shower, laundry and gas. The gas across the street is 10¬¢ cheaper. The shower is hot, but a little bit on the not so clean side. I washed my clothes in the shower to try and save on time and money. The washers $2.75 and ‚Ä¶

Truck parking is a little tight but the lot is clean. Shower rooms are on the small side but clean and there are plenty of them. Didn‚Äôt use the laundry or lounge but they looked clean and comfortable.
Talked a shower wash cloths eat at Denny's this place has it all not to mention getting gas and other Delectables select treats and drinks
Plenty of parking and well setup. Always able to get a shower here without having to wait. Staff was friendly and professional. Ate at the Denny's and the food was good and the service was not bad.
So un called for... I just entered to shower in #7 and noticed before I sat to take care of business... ridiculous 12-4-22 4:38pm

Came in at 1am.. Shower was very clean and the water was very hot, good water pressure. Good place to shower. The denny's was open as advertised (Sometimes they say 24hrs on google but then closed when you arrive late). Server was great. No ‚Ä¶

showerReviews.reviewText: Better bring soap, cause my shower had nothing but empty dispensers and big chunks of brown crud on the floor and in the shower.  They tend to run out of x-large cups and not restock until you ask for one. You'll be waiting 5-10 minutes on ‚Ä¶

I often come here because of my route. The showers are always dirty, and moldy and it seems like they don't clean the toilets after the shower is used. There is always a mess and the towels look like they are rarely cleaned. I end up using ‚Ä¶
One of the worst,  no holding of reserve parking,just show up and park anywhere doesn't even have to be a parking spot. Waited over 2 hours for a shower with 2 people ahead. Employees were on break

This place is filthy. Of course, I needed a shower; but if you can't keep the general bathroom clean I will not step into a shower. I was there for 12 hrs and not one time was that bathroom cleaned since one of the hand drying dispensers ‚Ä¶

Visited pilot store 438 on 3/22 for a shower. Even though the cost of showers has recently risen I have to give these guys their props.  The entire shower area was very clean, the floor, the toilet, the sink, all of it. I will definitely ‚Ä¶

The people who work there are nice an professional but who ever cleans the showers needs to be talked to. my first day in the shower no toilet paper an the shower would not drain properly.the second time I used the shower u could clearly ‚Ä¶

Wanted a good hot shower and wouldn't you know it I haven't been on the road past couple weeks and didn't pack a bar of soap. No biggie right? I mean, every pilot I've showered in had liquid soap in shower but I never needed it. ‚Ä¶

This place needs a massive change in employees working night shift who can keep up with shower cleanings and laundry. Waited over 45 minutes as the next in line while 6 showers remained open, uncleaned and without towels. When I asked what ‚Ä¶
‚Ä¶ For truckers, RV owners and anyone traveling looking for a shower, Pilot on exit 6 or Flying J at exit 2 are the best to get clean. ‚Ä¶

I normally stop here on my commute because I frequent this route!! Shower app doesn't work to check-in,nobody likes to clean apparently and I guess if u buy a whole bunch of merchandise they don't offer to ask If u need a bag!! This place ‚Ä¶

showerReviews.reviewText: Gotta be the cleanest showers I've ever used at ANY Pilot/Flying J/One9 in the 7 years I've been on the road. ‚Ä¶

went into a ‚Äúshower room‚Äù and it was the cleanest public restroom I have EVER been in! the towels were folded so neatly, there were mints and a water bottle. The shower looked as clean and inviting as could be!! ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ staff I have ever meet the store manager I think is what he was but the nicest I have ever meet.. went out of his way to see if we needed anything helped us with shower and all.. please go check this pilot out it would be worth your time .
A nice amount of parking and the staff was pretty friendly.  The bathrooms and shower were clean and fresh
Been driving all night wanted to take a hot shower the water was cold the shower curtain was nasty if I can give this pilot  0 stars I would have
Nice place hot shower nd eat subway good tho
Shower clean hot good pressure

showerReviews.reviewText: Stopped here to shower after coming off the road with our pup. First shock was how absolutely disgusting and filthy the dog park is. Trash overflow, grass isn‚Äôt cut and completely trashed. Loves is supposed to be clean places friendly ‚Ä¶
Do batter Loves no one wants to walk into the shower rooms with piss still on the toilet or a used soap in
‚Ä¶ Also, the handles were broken in the shower and the shower was extremely dirty. I mean dirty dirty. ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ Location,  it had the most friendliest employees and the manager was super nice. What made me so happy was the manager was in there cleaning the bathroom and the showers. That is a very common thing you see at loves, them main managers work ‚Ä¶

Tire pass doesn't work and I didn't have a shower on my card instead of helping me out the manager on duty now decided it would be best to stand there and give me a lecture on loves policy's. Other loves have helped me out when I'm behind ‚Ä¶
‚Ä¶ As for the Showers? Excellent! ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ being in the case so long. I've never had to get a shower here and for this I'm thankful, because the bathrooms are just as nasty as the food section so I can only imagine the showers and the towels. Somebody from corporate needs to make a ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ to think he's a good singer and it's rather annoying to say the least. Might suggest to your employees that they're encouraged to shower and if they're having issues at home maybe just let them use one of the showers available at work.
‚Ä¶ When you are a truck stop and it takes a new employee and a manager to figure out how to ring up a shower, it reflects bad on you. Not on me.

‚Ä¶ builder at the fuel desk needs a better attitude. He seriously needs to remove his Loves university pin if he is going to act like this job is an inconvenience. Other than the the rest of the staff was friendly and the shower was great.

showerReviews.reviewText: ‚Ä¶ of the nastiest truck stops I've been to. Fuel island was an oil slick. Obviously hadn't been cleaned in a coons age. Showers were disgusting. Very hastily "cleaned" not swept/ mopped mirror was filthy mold everywhere and the shower ‚Ä¶
Front desk, both ladies are unhelpful.  I asked them my truck smart isn't working, and I want to use my phone number for rewards to get a shower, but they keep refusing to help me.

‚Ä¶ parking lot, hire weaklings as security guards to enforce it. I paid for a spot but spent no penny on any other service. Not even shower, the place is nasty. 27 miles away is Loves, do yourself a favor and bypass unless you have emergency.
Not sure where to start. I will just say Shower wasn‚Äôt cleaned but I guess the person brought the bottle in to start on it. 95% of this place is reserved parking and is pre booked.
